description: Introducing a new silhouette in our buttery-soft melt fabric, the Wide Scoop Bra Tank. Offering full coverage and a built in shelf bra, the neutral tank is sure to become a go-to staple in your everyday wardrobe.

Our own Sleeveless Wrap Top features a flattering open neckline with a mock wrap detail and is made in our exclusive soft, brushed rib knit fabric. Perfect for all weather, this is a versatile piece that you’ll reach for season after season.

is perfect for everyday. Slouchy shoulders and side splits make it feel relaxed and comfortable. Wear it with tailored pants or its matching Lexington pants. This sweater features a elevated rhinestone detailing on the sleeves, a relaxed fit, and 100% cashmere.

In a beautiful, mélange, cashmere blend, our Camille Luxe Hoodie is the epitome of cozy. Special details like a functional, crochet drawstring and elongated deep ribbing at the cuffs and hem add texture, while sensual elements like a center front seam add a feminine touch. Sporty and sophisticated all in one wear-everywhere piece.

A hybrid design in a knitted wool blend with a power-stretch front in technical fibres, the Cabane knit jacket offers an upgrade for variable looks. Contrasting striped inserts add accents, while the stand-up collar and logo zip round off the style.
525 Celeste Boucle V Neck Cardigan is the perfect on the go cardigan for any time of year. Throw it on over your workout seat or dress it up and wear it with jeans.

In a relaxed fit, snap front silhouette, with blouson sleeves, this innovative style features a fluid design without armhole seams that creates a sensual effect. Finished beautifully with wide rib cuffs and hem, Illia is a statement maker.

Pro tip: The pattern on this top is sewn, not printed —talk about luxury!

The longer-line Freya is cut in our DoubleSoft fabric. With a rolled, high neck, drawcord and toggle waist cinch, it features deep side splits and dropped shoulders.
